body.name: SSK 128GB Dual USB C Flash Drive,2-in-1 Type C+ USB A 3.2 Gen2 Solid State Thumb Drive,Super Fast Speed Up to 550MB/s Memory Stick Data Storage for iPhone 15,Thunderbolt 3, Android Phone,Tablet,Laptop
body.stockDetail: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: Dual Drive USB C + USB A: Perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 port,the Dual USB SSD flash drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Instantly free up space or quickly move pictures or movies on your OTG enabled Android Type C phone, tablet, MacBook, Windows computer, car audio system, smart TV and more.

Ultra Fast High Speed: SSK USB 3.2 GEN 2 flash drive up to 550mb/s read speeds and 500mb/s write speed, which is 10 times faster than traditional USB 3.0 memory stick. Let you move high-resolution photos, videos fast and large-capacity files. Based on internal testing, performance may vary slightly due to factors such as host equipment, interfaces, and usage conditions.

Plug and Play: Ultra dual drive supports plug and play, without any software installation. At the same time, USB stick storage can expand the capacity of phones and computer. It is convenient for everyone to use the mobile phone to directly read the flash drive for file sharing, data transmission, and video playback when working or studying. Work with most systems such as Windows / Android/ Macbook Pro and Mac OS. (incompatible with lightning port)

Safe & Reliable: USB SSD drive is made of high-grade zinc alloy material, which is resistant to falling and abrasion. The design of the double-head protective cover better protects the two interfaces. External memory stick have excellent shock resistance and fast heat dissipation performance to better protect your data.

Universal Compatibility: High speed USB stick external storage compatible with computer equipment, smart TV, car audio, smart phones, iPhone 15, iPad, Laptops, Macbook and more. Backward-compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports. Comes with default format EXFAT, it works with most systems such as Windows/Linux/Mac OS./Android(Incompatible with lightning port)
body.description: High-Grade Zinc Alloy Housing USB C and USB A High-Speed Transmission Ports Portable Dual Flash Drive It is perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 interface, the dual flash drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Perfect storage solution for anyone on the go or at work. Tips: The Computer and USB Flash Drive have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Wear-resistant Appearance Double-Head Protective Cover Universal compatibility Available Capacity:128GB,256GB,512GB,1TB,2TB Flash drive for your choice

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Fast USB3.2 Gen 2 Type C + USB A Dual Flash Drive This Dual flash drive adopts the latest USB 3.2 Gen 2 standard, up to 550 MB/s read speed and 500 MB/s write speed, send 2GB 4K UHD video files from the storage stick to your PC in just 5 seconds , Let you work and play more efficiently. (Please Note: If connect to a USB 3.0 or USB 3.1 Gen1 interface, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s.)Work as fast as you need to with premium performance and huge capacities in a reliable USB flash drive. Ultra-fast performance lets you transfer a full 4K movie to the drive in less than 10 seconds, or 1000 photos in less than 20 seconds.

Stable Reading/Writing Speed During the transmission and the use of capacity, Ultra dual flash drive still maintain high-speed transmission.It will not drop off sharply halfway through the read process even when it reaches its full storage capacity. Let you move high-resolution photos, videos fast and large-capacity files. Note: The Writing Speed remains stable when the file size of each transfer is less than 1/4 of the remaining usuable capacity. For example, when the USB SSD drive has 600GB available capacity left, you can transfer data less than 150GB at a time, the speed will not drop.

SSK products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SSK products. Note: Only when your connection port is USB3.2 Gen2 or higher, the reading speed can reach up to 550MB/s For new devices, you need to insert a little force into the computer at first. High-Grade Zinc Alloy Housing USB C and USB A High-Speed Transmission Ports Portable Dual Flash Drive It is perfectly equipped with an USB-C port and USB-A 3.2 interface, the dual flash drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Perfect storage solution for anyone on the go or at work. Tips: The Computer and USB Flash Drive have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Wear-resistant Appearance Double-Head Protective Cover Universal compatibility Available Capacity:128GB,256GB,512GB,1TB,2TB Flash drive for your choice

SSD Good DIE grade Chip, Safe & Reliable Using original SSD solid-state Good DIE grade memory chips, with high quality and strong stability. It features a zinc alloy material casing that protects the drive from unexpected knocks, fast heat dissipation and low power consumption. It also comes with a leather case for your portable carry. Note: The speed does not drop when write data at once within 1/4 of remaining capacity. Super Fast Speed Memory Stick Data Storage up to 550mb/s read speeds and 500mb/s write speed,which is 10 times faster than traditional USB 3.0 memory stick. Tips: If connect to a USB3.0 or USB3.1 Gen1 port, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s. Let you work and play more efficiently. Support Win to go USB flash drive supports win to go system, allowing the system to be carried with you, thereby improving work efficiency. Tips: The product itself doesn't have a system, and the WTG system needs to be installed by yourself. MacBooks with M1 and M2 chips do not support WTG. Plug and Play SSK Dual flash drive with the Type C and USB A 3.2 Gen2 port, photo memory stick for computer & android phones. You can easily transfer files and data between smartphones, tablets and computers, efficiently save file transfer time.

Whether the product is compatible with IOS？ Thank you for your question and our SD301 is compatible with Type C and USB A ports. If your IOS device is with a lightning port, It is not compatible with our SD301. If your IOS device is with type C port, our SD301 can compatible with it well directly. You can first connect the C port of your phone, find and open the "Files" App, and then click "Browse", "SSK SD301" will appear so that you can start to use it. Is it normal for the product to heat up during use? This memory stick is a portable solid state flash drive, the speed is faster a lot than ordinary flash drive, and it is made of metal material, which has better thermal conductivity, so that the heat will be much more than the ordinary flash drive. Your hands may feel a little hot, but this is normal. This situation will not affect your use, nor will it damage the data. Our products have gone through a series of sophisticated tests, which is safety enough in normal using. Why can't SD301 be recognized on a smartphone? How to solve it? First, please go to check the flash drive’s format, please make sure it is EXFAT, if it is not EXFAT, please format it first (Before formatting, please backup all your data);Second, please go to check whether the OTG function is enabled, most of OPPO's mobile phones need to manually open the OTG function. Only when the OTG function is enabled, the data transmission of external devices can be carried out. So you need to turn on the OTG function of your phone. The details can be found on Youtube. You can search for "How to Enable OTG Connection on OPPO Developer Options" on Youtube. Why does the write speed of SD301 drop when I write to large files at once? Writing large-capacity files at one time,the write speed will decline is a common problem of most solid-state drives. Even solid state drives produced by well-known companies also have this problem, which is a technical problem, not a problem of our product itself. If you want to maintain a high write speed, it is recommended that you do not write more than 1/4 of the remaining usable capacity at one time. For example, when the USB SSD drive has 600GB available capacity left, you can transfer data less than 150GB at a time, the speed will not drop. Whether the product is compatible with IOS？ Is it normal for the product to heat up during use? Why can't SD301 be recognized on a smartphone? How to solve it? Why does the write speed of SD301 drop when I write to large files at once?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Designed well, works well
reviews.reviewText: This drive is designed thoughtfully and works very well. It is fast on read and write (not just read.) The case appears to be a durable metal. The added USB C jack is a nice bonus, and it also comes with a leather key-ring pouch.One minor point: I notice the drive tends to warm up during use, although not excessively. I hope this does not limit its lifetime.I got this drive to back up my Linux laptop. I repartitioned and reformatted it to an ext4 file system with no problems. It mounts quickly and works perfectly with all my software.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this fo I could load a Windows to go version so I could boot from this drive for testing. It worked great, fast speeds and could not even tell it was a USB drive I was working from. Excellent drive, would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, Sturdy, Good Daily Driver
reviews.reviewText: Let me start with my one and only negative point since its more like a humble brag really. Some people might not care for the extra weight of this flash drive in their pocket. Its built very solid with a metal case that will weigh down a shirt pocket more than your average plastic flash drive does. On the other hand though, it should ensure this is a very sturdy and reliable daily driver that stands up well to pants pockets and the like over time.Performance wise it’s the fastest writing flash drive I own. Totally blows away all the cheaper more disposable drives I own.We will see how this drive stands up over time, but on initial arrival I feel this drive is well worth the extra cost in exchange for the superior speeds and solid sturdiness of the metal housing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Very Fast Flash Drive to Back-up Samsung S23
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should to back-up Samsung S23 128GB Phone. Very fast read/write speeds. Super fast delivery.I received the following email instructions which should be updated on the Item's description page:"This email is to inform you some tips that may help you fully utilize our high speed solid state flash drive.1. Our USB flash drive using SSD solid-state memory chips, with high quality and strong stability.The Writing Speed remains stable when the file size of each transfer is less than 1/3 of the remaining usuable capacity. For example, when the USB SSD drive has 600GB available capacity left, you can transfer data less than 200GB at a time, the speed will not drop. High speed transmission state, product heating is a normal phenomenon.2. The drive’s default format is EXFAT, if the format changes, please set the format to EXFAT, it is compatible with iPhone 15, iPad which is with Type C Port. You can first connect the C port of your phone, find and open the "Files" app, and then click "Browse", "SSK SD301" will appear so that you can start to use."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it! I use the drive for transferring large 3D models from Mac, to PC to iPad. Sooooo. Much faster than my old USB drive. Also, very nice weight and feel in the hand. Makes all my other thumb drives seem cheap. Cons: With this big of a drive I think it’s time to have finger print security. Not for more money but at same cost. Also, the USB C cover flips to the side. This crowds out use of another usb c port on my iMac. I wish the drive had caps on both ends. Also, though it’s well built, I’m scared I might break off the usb-c connector one day when I press too hard to open the shield.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great USB drive!
reviews.reviewText: Shockingly fast, USB-A and C connections, and a nice little case for lanyards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Initial impressions are favorable.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a device to copy images and video from my phone to my PC or other devices. I plugged it into my S23 Ultra, copied 67 gigs of media from the camera to this drive, then plugged it into my PC and transferred it to an nvme SSD. This thing flies, enough so that I ran a quick benchmark . The results are attached. I used the USB-C ports only, and the drive did get slightly warm.The drive is also heavier than I expected, but it seems well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For once a USB Flash Drive that's as fast as advertised! I was seeing sustained write speeds between 450-500 MB/sec even on large 10-20GB files. Most "high speed" drives slow down due to thermal throttling on large extended duration file transfers, but this drive is all metal (and quite heavy) so it easily dissipates heat from the chipset.
LA RECOMIENDO MUCHO, TRAE SU FUNDA, EL MATERIAL DE EXCELENTE CALIDAD Y BUENA VELOCIDAD, LA RECOMIENDO MUCHO, NO LO DUDEN
clé 128gb connecté 3.2 gen2, aussi rapide qu'un ssd interne, très content de cet achat.

Avevo bisogno di una usb con velocità di scrittura e lettura alta, per trasferimento grossi file. Ho provato diverse chiavette, anche di marche che ho già provato e di cui sono soddisfatto, ma ho dovuto rendere 2 volte il prodotto comprato perché le velocità promesse non erano reali. Finalmente mi sono deciso a leggere un forum di benchmark chiavette e ho visto questa marca che non conoscevo, ma con risultati al test molto buoni. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è notevole, nonostante costi più di una normale usb 3.0, ma con mia grande soddisfazione le velocità sono ottime. Esteticamente è molto curata ed ha sia interfaccia usb normale che interfaccia usb tipo C. Bellissimo il foderino in finta pelle con anello portachiavi, utile per il trasporto. Molto pesante in quanto in metallo, sensazione premium. Un pò scomoda la chiusura per la usb C, ma comunque molto sicura. Consiglio l'acquisto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a very solid build. Easy to use which is the best part. Good speed in my opinion. Does the job overall all. Worth the money 💰
Lleno de fotografías y videos de mis viajes, ningún problema en la reproducción.
